name: Rfissa with chicken
steps: Sear the chicken for 5 minutes in a pan with 2 tbsp of olive oil until golden brown. Deglaze the pan with 200 g of water and set aside.
In a pot, chop the onions. Add the ras el-hanout, turmeric, paprika, ginger, cinnamon, and 2 tbsp of olive oil. Saut√© for 5 minutes.
Add the chicken (in a steamer basket or directly in the pot), salt, the remaining water (600 g), and the deglazing liquid. Cook for 20 minutes.
Add the lentils (previously soaked) and cook for an additional 10 minutes.
Place the m'semen strips (tride) on the serving dish. Arrange the lentils and chicken on top.
Generously drizzle with the cooking juice. Season with salt and pepper, sprinkle with coriander, and serve very hot.
